title: ADDIE Model-Based Image Utilization Strategy for University Education Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Work-integrated learning environment for professionals, within smartphone-based limited technological conditions.

learning_goals: Learners can apply the five stages of the ADDIE model (Analysis-Design-Development-Implementation-Evaluation) to instructional design processes in conjunction with image materials.
Learners can design educational materials that improve learner comprehension by over 20% by converting scientific concepts into visual images.
Learners can develop lesson modules integrating simple image tools (infographics, diagrams, etc.) creatable with smart devices into LMS environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
